required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 14, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Characterization and Verification of the Intensive Care Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) Adherence of the Treated COVID-19 Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Characterization and Verification of the Intensive Care Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) Adherence of the Treated COVID-19 Patients

brief_summary.textblock: As part of the internal quality management (QM project), this retrospective cohort study examines the adherence to Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) of the COVID-19 patients treated since January 1st, 2020 to February 28th, 2021 in intensive care units of the Clinic for Anesthesiology m.S. operative intensive care medicine CCM / CVK.

primary_outcome.measure: SOP "Analgesia, sedation, delirium and pain therapy"
primary_outcome.description: SOP adherence to the selected SOP "Analgesia, sedation, delirium and pain therapy". Process: daily implementation yes / no - yes> 70%

secondary_outcome.measure: SOP "Treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)"
secondary_outcome.description: SOP adherence to the selected SOP "Treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS)" Process: daily implementation yes / no - yes> 70%
SOP adherence to the selected SOP "Infectious treatment" Process: daily implementation yes / no - yes> 70%
SOP adherence to the selected SOP "Weaning"
SOP adherence to the selected SOP "Nutrition" Process: daily implementation yes / no - yes> 70%
SOP adherence to the selected SOP "Sepsis" Process: daily implementation yes / no - yes> 70%

study_pop.textblock: During the intensive care stay with SARS-CoV-2 infected intensive care adult patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- During the intensive care stay with SARS-CoV-2 infected intensive care patients of the Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin, admitted to the intensive care units of the Department of Anesthesiology and operative intensive care medicine (CCM / CVK)
- Treatment period: 01/01/2020 to 02/28/2021
- At least 18 years old
Exclusion Criteria:
• Incomplete electronic documentation

facility.name: Department of Anesthesiology and Operative Intensive Care Medicine (CCM/CVK), Campus Virchow-Klinikum

responsible_party.investigator_title: Head of the Department of Anesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine (CCM/CVK)
